page.title: 04LEISURE,FORT AUGUSTUS.
page.content: If you are a visitor to {Fort Augustus then there are a various number of sports and activities for you to take part in. In {Fort Augustus }we have a tennis court.There is also a nine hole golf course just on the outskirts on the { {Fort William }road. If you are a water sport enthusiast you can hire a canoe or a pleasure cruiser. However if you are not a sporty person you can always go pony trecking,or go on one of the various forest walks which are available. If it is a wet day many people find their way to the local leisure centre and play the various games which are available there. For smaller children there is a small park with swings and climbing frames ,and this is very popular.
